entry.title: Clunky
entry.content: “Watch from beginning” option takes you to “Live”. So you see the score - not great. “Back 10” and “forward 10” buttons intermittently disappear. Rewind scroll bar at bottom does not rewind or display the time moving back.$90 bucks for a buggy app - good one Spark!

Clunky

“Watch from beginning” option takes you to “Live”. So you see the score - not great. “Back 10” and “forward 10” buttons intermittently disappear. Rewind scroll bar at bottom does not rewind or display the time moving back.$90 bucks for a buggy app - good one Spark!

entry.title: A bit shonky

entry.title: Loving it
entry.content: So far I’ve been able to watch F1 perfectly anywhere. Even on a mountain with 3G. Great app always getting better. Now if only it had PGA golf too!!

Loving it

entry.title: Beware
entry.content: Beware if you want to suspend your subscription... spark won’t let you watch any content from the date you cancel, NOT from the end of your billing cycle, unlike others like beIN or Netflix. I suspended my account a week before the end of my cycle, thinking I could watch another week. No luck. And they don’t want to give a partial refund. They still treat customers very badly. Would not recommend for that reason.

Beware

Beware if you want to suspend your subscription... spark won’t let you watch any content from the date you cancel, NOT from the end of your billing cycle, unlike others like beIN or Netflix.
I suspended my account a week before the end of my cycle, thinking I could watch another week. No luck. And they don’t want to give a partial refund. They still treat customers very badly.
Would not recommend for that reason.

entry.title: Hopeless, it’s useless for the rugby World Cup.
entry.content: $89 for an app that won’t run on my Apple TV 4. I have the correct app and correct Apple TV but it refuses to accept my password. I tried to live chat for help but it’s closed for the night, no help. The help page is of no help. I have updated my Apple TV, it’s good to go. But the app is hopeless, it won’t logon. Don’t buy it, it’s not worth the money for the rugby World Cup.

Hopeless, it’s useless for the rugby World Cup.

$89 for an app that won’t run on my Apple TV 4. I have the correct app and correct Apple TV but it refuses to accept my password.
I tried to live chat for help but it’s closed for the night, no help.
The help page is of no help.
I have updated my Apple TV, it’s good to go. But the app is hopeless, it won’t logon. Don’t buy it, it’s not worth the money for the rugby World Cup.

entry.title: Worst streaming experience ever - too restrictive
entry.content: Tells me I’m using in too many devices. I’ve only ever used on my phone and one pc. I log out my sky sport account on the pc and closed the browser. Open the app and it says I cannot watch - too many devices in use. There are no (zero) other devices in use. I understand the desire to stop sharing, but this is blocking legitimate paid for usage. Very very poor. If I need to go out part way through watching the game and want to transfer to my phone to continue watching, I won’t be able to.

Worst streaming experience ever - too restrictive

Tells me I’m using in too many devices. I’ve only ever used on my phone and one pc. I log out my sky sport account on the pc and closed the browser. Open the app and it says I cannot watch - too many devices in use. There are no (zero) other devices in use. I understand the desire to stop sharing, but this is blocking legitimate paid for usage. Very very poor. If I need to go out part way through watching the game and want to transfer to my phone to continue watching, I won’t be able to.

entry.title: Magic techno stuff!

Magic techno stuff!

As a long-time sky subscriber I’m delighted with the new spark service. I watched a full game of football in heavy Auckland rain and didn’t get rain fade once! And all from my telephone! The future is awesome! (sorry to use a Vodafone slogan, but it’s true)

entry.title: Complete utter joke!!!
entry.content: This has got to be one of the worst experiences I’ve ever had trying to watch EPL. Didn’t manage to catch the start of the game live so tried clicking “watch from the start” and it sent me to the live playback anyway, giving me the score I spent 2 hours successfully ignoring. The week previous it kept logging out during the live broadcast, almost every 15 minutes. Maybe you should have spent more money developing the app rather than buying the rights to the sporting events you quite clearly aren’t capable of broadcasting.

Complete utter joke!!!

This has got to be one of the worst experiences I’ve ever had trying to watch EPL. Didn’t manage to catch the start of the game live so tried clicking “watch from the start” and it sent me to the live playback anyway, giving me the score I spent 2 hours successfully ignoring. The week previous it kept logging out during the live broadcast, almost every 15 minutes. Maybe you should have spent more money developing the app rather than buying the rights to the sporting events you quite clearly aren’t capable of broadcasting.

entry.title: Ripped off
entry.content: Tried the 7 day trial. Poor experience so cancelled. I cancelled on day 8 so they took a months subscription which is fair enough but even though I have paid for the month apparently I don't have an active subscription. Help desk is appalling. Good luck with the World Cup. My advice is keep your money.

Ripped off

Tried the 7 day trial. Poor experience so cancelled. I cancelled on day 8 so they took a months subscription which is fair enough but even though I have paid for the month apparently I don't have an active subscription. Help desk is appalling. Good luck with the World Cup. My advice is keep your money.

entry.title: Potential, but limited options at present
entry.content:
Promising, but doesn’t seem ready.
Not many options to control bandwidth evident, stream would degrade whenever there was a lot of movement, which happens a lot in sport. Not entirely sparks fault, but it would be good to be able to manually adjust bandwidth/quality.
Menu system still a bit cluttered and confusing for me.
Biggest issue for me is that live streams are out of sync. Audio consistently 2 seconds behind the video. I tried to fix it by looking at spark FAQ and help pages. Absolutely nothing there other than a rather condescending suggestion that I check that my decide isn’t muted. Checked google for similar apps with this issue and did that, didn’t fix it.
So I can’t continue with a sub at this stage. The audio is just too annoying. When this is fixed I’ll reconsider.

Potential, but limited options at present

Promising, but doesn’t seem ready.

Not many options to control bandwidth evident, stream would degrade whenever there was a lot of movement, which happens a lot in sport. Not entirely sparks fault, but it would be good to be able to manually adjust bandwidth/quality.

Menu system still a bit cluttered and confusing for me.

Biggest issue for me is that live streams are out of sync. Audio consistently 2 seconds behind the video. I tried to fix it by looking at spark FAQ and help pages. Absolutely nothing there other than a rather condescending suggestion that I check that my decide isn’t muted. Checked google for similar apps with this issue and did that, didn’t fix it.

So I can’t continue with a sub at this stage. The audio is just too annoying. When this is fixed I’ll reconsider.

entry.title: Access to app information is incorrect
entry.content: I have just been on a long, boring and ultimately fruitless chat with Spark Sport technical support. The agent told me they are “aware customer experience is below expectations” and “will be making changes to app and streaming services after the World Cup.” How convenient for all outlets selling new tvs (mine’s 2018 & doesn’t support app without new generation Apple TV/Chromecast). I smell a rat Spark.

Access to app information is incorrect

I have just been on a long, boring and ultimately fruitless chat with Spark Sport technical support.
The agent told me they are “aware customer experience is below expectations” and “will be making changes to app and streaming services after the World Cup.”
How convenient for all outlets selling new tvs (mine’s 2018 & doesn’t support app without new generation Apple TV/Chromecast).
I smell a rat Spark.

entry.title: Underwhelming
entry.content:
Watched the first EPL game this morning and was underwhelmed. Goals were updated on another App I use to my Apple Watch about 60 seconds before they happened on the ‘live’ coverage. The picture quality deteriorated to a fuzzy state for 2 to 3 minute blocks every so often.
It’ll have to get a lot better than this in time for the RWC.

Underwhelming

Watched the first EPL game this morning and was underwhelmed. Goals were updated on another App I use to my Apple Watch about 60 seconds before they happened on the ‘live’ coverage. The picture quality deteriorated to a fuzzy state for 2 to 3 minute blocks every so often.

It’ll have to get a lot better than this in time for the RWC.
